title: Comfort and Adam Return to JAFAX!
content:
Comfort and Adam are the award nominated duo responsible for "The Uniques" and "Rainbow in the Dark", and "The Complete Guide to Self-Publishing Comics (Random House)". They also run an art studio called 'Team Comfort and Adam', and in 2020 will run their first massive Kickstarter for "The Uniques", season 2.

Check out their full bio here!
